entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.5°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 61 %

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
